object.name: PreCheckoutQuery
object.description: This object contains information about an incoming pre-checkout query.
object.html_description: This object contains information about an incoming pre-checkout query.
object.rst_description: This object contains information about an incoming pre-checkout query.

annotations.description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).
annotations.html_description: Total price in the smallest units of the currency (integer, not float/double). For example, for a price of US$ 1.45 pass amount = 145. See the exp parameter in currencies.json, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).
annotations.rst_description: Total price in the *smallest units* of the currency (integer, **not** float/double). For example, for a price of :code:`US$ 1.45` pass :code:`amount = 145`. See the *exp* parameter in `currencies.json <https://core.telegram.org/bots/payments/currencies.json>`_, it shows the number of digits past the decimal point for each currency (2 for the majority of currencies).
annotations.name: total_amount

annotations.description: Identifier of the shipping option chosen by the user
annotations.html_description: Optional. Identifier of the shipping option chosen by the user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Identifier of the shipping option chosen by the user
annotations.name: shipping_option_id

annotations.description: Order information provided by the user
annotations.html_description: Optional. Order information provided by the user
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Order information provided by the user
annotations.name: order_info
